subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees have had internal discussions about signing Mark Teixeira over the last few days and would be willing to offer him an eight-year, $160 million contract, said a source.
snippet: The Yankees have had internal discussions about signing Mark Teixeira over the last few days and would be willing to offer him an eight-year, $160 million contract, said a source.
